headline: GDT Nature Photographer of the Year 2013  in pictures
text: Overall and mammals category winner: Red Fox in sunset light by Hermann Hirsch Photograph: Hermann Hirsch/GDT Nature Photographer of the Year 2013       Winner in birds category: Icy resting place by Bernd Nill Photograph: Bernd Nill/GDT Nature Photographer of the Year 2013       Birds runner-up: Returning from the hunt by Michael Lohmann  Photograph: Michael Lohmann/Magische Momente/GDT Nature Photographer of the Year 2013       Mammals category third place: When it gets dark by Christoph Kaula  Photograph: Christoph Kaula/GDT Nature Photographer of the Year 2013       Mammals runner-up: Fox in cloudy forest by Klaus Echle Photograph: Klaus Echle/GDT       Winner in other animals category: In the spotlight by Klaus Tamm  Photograph: Klaus Tamm/GDT Nature Photographer of the Year 2013       Runner-up other animals category: Wingtips by Karsten Mosebach  Photograph: Klaus Tamm/GDT Nature Photographer of the Year 2013       Plants and fungi category winner: Woman shoe by Ariane Mller  Photograph: Ariane Mueller/GDT Nature Photographer of the Year 2013       Plants and fungi runner-up: Maple in cloudy forest by Joachim Wimmer  Photograph: Joachim Wimmer/GDT Nature Photographer of the Year 2013       Landscapes category runner-up: Blooming landscape by Sandra Bartocha Photograph: Sandra Bartocha/GDT Nature Photographer of the Year 2013       Nature's studio winner: 'Blubb' by Sigi Zang  Photograph: Sigi Zang/GDT Nature Photographer of the Year 2013       Nature's studio runner-up: Indian summer by Katharina Becker  Photograph: Katharina Becker/GDT Nature Photographer of the Year 2013       Special category 2013 animal portraits winner: Grouse portrait by Klaus Echle  Photograph: Klaus Echle/GDT Nature Photographer of the Year 2013       Animal portraits runner-up: Young lion by Carsten Ott  Photograph: Carsten Ott/GDT Nature Photographer of the Year 2013
